DOC.brief_title: Development Next Generation Sequencing ( NGS ) -Based Assay Detect Preeclampsia Molecular Markers
DOC.detailed_description: This limited prospective collection whole blood sample pregnant woman diagnosis preterm preeclampsia and/or fetal growth restriction addition sample control group aid development Next Generation Sequencing ( NGS ) -based assay detect molecular marker associate preterm preeclampsia .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women 18 year age older enrollment 2 . Pregnant woman viable singleton gestation 3 . Able provide write , inform consent 4 . Able provide 20 mL whole blood 5 . Diagnosis preeclampsia severe feature and/or diagnosis fetal growth restriction . 1 . Preeclampsia severe feature define : Proteinuria : Execretion ≥300mg/24hr ( 24 hour collection ) protein time excretion extrapolate 24 hour urine value protein/creatinine [ mg/dL ] ratio least 0.3 qualitative determination ( urine dipstick ) ≥1+ WITH Systolic BP ≥160mmHg diastolic BP ≥110mmHg least 2 occasion 4 hour apart bedrest onset labor OR Systolic BP ≥160mmHg diastolic BP ≥110mmHg 1 occasion onset labor , antihypertensive therapy initiate due severe hypertension OR New onset hypertension define : Systolic BP ≥140 mmHg diastolic ≥90 mmHg one follow feature : Thrombocytopenia ( < 100,000 plts/mL ) ; impair liver function ( AST/ALT 2X ULN ) ; newly develop renal insufficiency ( serum creatinine > 1.1mg/dL double serum creatinine absence renal disease ) ; pulmonary edema ; new onset cerebral disturbance scotomata 2 . Fetal Growth Restriction define : Estimated fetal weight ultrasound ≥ 19 0/7 week gestational age < 5 % ile 510 % ile abnormal umbilical artery Doppler examination ( S/D ratio > 95 % ile gestational age , absent end diastolic flow reverse end diastolic flow ) 6 . Gestational age 20 0/7 33 6/7 week determine ultrasound and/or LMP per ACOG guidelines1 . A subject diagnose preeclampsia without severe feature prior 33 6/7 week gestation manage expectantly develop severe feature 34 week may include . 1 . Known malignancy 2 . History maternal organ bone marrow transplant 3 . Maternal blood transfusion last 8 week 4 . Chronic hypertension diagnose prior current pregnancy 5 . Type I , II gestational diabetes 6 . Fetal anomaly know chromosome abnormality 7 . Active labor
